definitions: The action of propelling something with force through the air by a movement of the arm and hand.
The action of causing something to fall or be displaced from an upright position.
The action of putting on or taking off clothes quickly and carelessly.
The action of directing a look, remark, or question at someone.
The action of causing someone to be confused or disoriented.
examples: The strong wind is throwing trees down.
She is throwing on her coat.
He is throwing glances her way.
The sudden change is throwing him off.
